name: Void
description: An endless void seems to spiral toward a central hole that devours all. This card spells disaster.

person.reverse: A person who has lost everything and has no place left to go but up.

creatureTrap.upright: A Fiend or an Undead that threatens annihilation of body and soul, or a trap with no easy exit or escape.
creatureTrap.reverse: A skeleton, zombie, or similar Undead remnant of a living creature; alternatively, a trap that's broken and nonfunctional.

place.upright: A place deep underground, underwater, or in space, where little light and air are available.
place.reverse: A place of utter carnage, where a terrible battle or massacre took place.

treasure.upright: An art object that reflects its creator's despair or sadness, or a Sphere of Annihilation.
treasure.reverse: A treasure promised but not actually present, such as an empty treasure chest or a looted vault.

situation.upright: A situation that seems to have no good or even survivable outcome.
situation.reverse: The aftermath of a destructive event, where the few survivors must figure out how to go on living.
